definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: In addition, Judgements that place debuffs can no longer be resisted.
sentences.chinese: 此外，對目標造成減益效果的審判不再被抵抗。

sentences.english: They will all provide the same debuff at 12% armor reduction.
sentences.chinese: 他們都將提供相同的減益效果的裝甲減少12%。
